cause.description:
whether u grew up with the greats (Nas, Jay-Z, Rakim, Run-D.M.C.,Biggie,Pac, ATCQ, DeLa etc.) or you're just fed-up with all the crap that sounds the same on the radio
1. Hip-hop is the people's voice!
2. Sure sales are good, but isn't quality better than quantity?
3. Remember J-Kwon? (thats what i thought)
4. what!? lil' wayne DIDN'T write the carter 1?
5. its the whole "lets use the same beat for a billion songs" thing that annoys us
6. "a bay bay" and such ISN'T i repeat ISN'T hip-hop, its club/rap/pop music... nuff said
7. so yea, kanye proved that "hip-hop" still has a chance against such a mainstream artist as 50 pence
8. come on people give us more positions?!!?!??!
cause.mission: cleanse the industry of the decline of good music
cause.name: Save Hip-hop!
